name: Venal
description:
Venal is a short narrative game with combat elements made in under a week with GB Studio for a university project.

Features
  • Explore the Laboratory under Oceanário de Lisboa
  • Meet the President
  • Kill Hydro-Sapiens
  • Encounter their creator, Alexander Kauff
Controls

Credits

 Cecy (@_excetera) - Backgrounds, Coding, Sprites

 Francisco (@_seainbetween) - Level Design, Game Design, Narrative, Sprites

 Marta (@meepmeepawoooo) - Character Sprites, Animation
